active.subject: EcoTaxa account activation.
active.body:
Your account has been activated.
You can now login to the EcoTaxa application and start creating a project.{link}.
If you have any questions or need additional support, email: {email}

desactive.subject: EcoTaxa account desactivation.
desactive.body:
Your account has been desactivated.
You cannot login to EcoTaxa anymore.
If you have any questions about your data or need additional support, email: {email}

modify.subject: EcoTaxa account modification request.

reason.email: Please provide a professional or academic email. providers like gmail, hotmail and similar are not accepted to activate your account.
reason.organisation: Please provide a verified organisation name.
reason.creation: Please give some more details about the reason of your registration and EcoTaxa usage.

modify.body:
Some of the information provided in your profile need to be modified :
